body.p:
You can use the New DITA Topic action from the AI Positron Assistant
Actions Content Generation category to ask the AI Positron create a new DITA topic containing content expanded by the AI based on an initial idea.
Examples (paste the content from each code block below in the New DITA Topic prompt dialog):

dlentry.dt: Create a DITA XML topic for installing a fictional application

p.codeblock: Installing an application named Emerald on Mac OS using the DMG installer.

dlentry.dt: Create a DITA XML topic based on a short description

p.codeblock: Create an "Installation" DITA topic with 2 sections: "System requirements" and "Installation steps". Provide some minimum and recommended values for the system requirements. Use a 3-column table for the system resources, the columns being called Resource, Minimum and Recommended. Don't forget to use the <body> element inside the topic.
